Hey Juan, I just received another inquiry about financing options for your current CX-9 lease. We won‚Äôt know the exact payment until we get the rates back from the banks, since we‚Äôll need to submit your info to a couple of them first.

Would you like to schedule a time to bring in the CX-9 and complete the buyout?
Josh ‚Äì Tustin Mazda

AL here at Tustin Mazda, where we stand out with no addendums and value every trade even if you don't buy with us! How about we start by finding the perfect Mazda for you? When is a good time to visit us?

Just reaching back out to you to make sure you have all the information you need. If you have any questions I can answer please don't hesitate to call me or reply to this message.

Hello Juan , Here with Tustin Mazda. I know it's been a few weeks since you first submitted an inquiry with us and wanted to see if there is anything I can do to help. are you still in the market for a vehicle?
